Class JHeading

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • ca.cgjennings.ui.JHeading
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    public class JHeading
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    A title heading label with large font and grey underline.
    Since:
    3.00
    Author:
    Chris Jennings
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
